skewY(-.1953125deg)}}#about_bg{position:absolute;min-width:100vw;top:0;bottom:0;right:0;height:100vh}.about .text-block{max-width:920px}.question{flex-direction:row}.question li{flex-basis:49%;width:48%;flex-grow:1}.question li .question-icon{width:100px;height:100px;margin-right:15px}.question li p{padding:7.5px 20px}.skills{justify-content:space-around;flex-wrap:wrap}.skills,.skills .skill{display:flex;align-items:center}.skills .skill{padding:10px;flex-basis:200px;width:100%;max-width:250px;flex-grow:1;min-width:200px;margin:10px;animation-delay:.2s}.skills .skill-logo{font-size:2em;color:#fff;margin-right:10px}.skills .skill-logo img{width:34px}.skills .skill-label{color:#59dbd5}.skills .skill-description{color:#e7e5e4}.example-content,.example-item{width:320px}.device-list{display:flex;flex-direction:row;justify-content:space-between;padding:15px;flex-wrap:wrap;box-sizing:border-box}.device-shadow{box-shadow:0 0 5px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.8)}.device-wrapper{width:332.8px;height:220px;position:relative;margin:7.5px;display:flex;align-items:center;flex-wrap:wrap;justify-content:space-around}.device-wrapper .desktop{margin-bottom:10px}.device-wrapper .desktop+.phablet{position:absolute;right:-30px;top:34px}.device-wrapper .desktop+.mobile{position:absolute;top:30px;right:-30px}.device-wrapper .mobile,.device-wrapper .phablet{z-index:1}.desktop{width:320px;height:175px;background-color:#8d8d8d;border-radius:5px;padding:10px;transition:1s}.desktop:hover{transform:scale(1.3)}.desktop .monitor{background-size:102%}.phablet{width:165px;height:220px;background-color:#8d8d8d;padding:7px;border-radius:10px;transition:1s}.phablet:hover{transform:scale(1.5);cursor:pointer}.phablet .monitor{border-radius:10px}.mobile{width:70px;height:140px;background-color:#8d8d8d;border-radius:9px;padding:3px;position:relative;transition:transform 1s}.mobile:hover{transform:scale(2.5)}.mobile:before{content:"";position:absolute;height:7px;background-color:#8d8d8d;width:30px;top:0;left:50%;margin-left:-15px;border-bottom-left-radius:4px;border-bottom-right-radius:4px;z-index:2}.mobile .monitor{border-radius:9px;background-position-y:4px}.monitor{width:100%;height:100%;background-color:#fff;background-size:contain;background-repeat:no-repeat}.platform-list span{word-spacing:5px}.service{display:flex;width:100%;z-index:1}.service .plank{width:100%;max-width:600px;flex-basis:400px;margin:15px 10px;position:relative}.service .plank>img{box-shadow:0 3px 13px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.12)}.service-bg{background-color:#055154;background:#055154;box-shadow:0 5px 16px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.6);transform:rotate(2deg);position:absolute;top:0;bottom:0;left:-500px;right:-500px}.contacts{width:90%;background:#fff;box-shadow:0 2px 5px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.2);padding:30px}@media (max-width:990px){.contacts{width:100%;padding:30px 10px}}@media (max-width:576px){.contacts{padding:30px 5px;justify-content:center}}.contacts .contact-block{flex-basis:400px;flex-grow:1;margin-bottom:25px}.contacts .contact-title{margin-bottom:25px}.contacts .contact-list-item{margin:10px 5px;height:max-content;flex-wrap:nowrap}.contacts .contact-list-item.compose{flex-basis:250px}.contacts .contact-list-item:hover .contact-logo{transform:translateY(-3px)}.contacts .contact-list-item a{color:#8d8d8d;font-family:Avant Garde,Avantgarde,Century Gothic,CenturyGothic,AppleGothic,sans-serif}.contacts .contact-list-item a:hover{color:#59dbd5}.contacts .contact-list-item input{padding:10px 15px;margin-left:0}.contacts .contact-list-item textarea{padding:10px 15px;margin-left:0;width:100%}.contacts .contact-logo{width:30px;height:30px;margin-right:10px;transition:.4s}
